text: You throw yourself back down the corridor and snatch up the JEWELLED SWORD. In the same instant that you pick up the JEWELLED SWORD, a wall of solid stone appears behind you, blocking the corridor. The JEWELLED SWORD was a magical trap and you are now penned in at the end of a cul-de-sac. The barbarians are now almost on top of you.

choices.text: Keep hold of the JEWELLED SWORD and fight it out with them
